fields.name: displayError
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

fields.name: headerSelectEmployee
fields.fieldText: Select Employee

fields.name: displayDisplayCurrentScheduleHeader
fields.fieldText:
Current Work Scheedule for {!Employee.Name}


Weekly Work Time: {!Aggregate_Work_Hours} hours

fields.name: displaySelectWorkDays
fields.fieldText: Modify {!Employee.Name}'s Work Schedule

fields.name: Update_or_Delete_Work_Schedule
fields.fieldText: Update or Delete Work Schedule

fields.name: displayDeleteInfo
fields.fieldText:
Delete Work Schedule


Use this option if for example a User's Work Schedule includes Friday and they will no longer as default work on that day.


All days you select here, will be deleted.


If you only wish to update the work times or create new ones, select Create/Update instead.

fields.name: displayCreateUpdateInfo
fields.fieldText:
Create/Update Work Schedule


For each selected day, set a Start and an End Time.

If a Work Schedule does not yet exist for a selected day, it will be created.


To delete any existing Work Schedules select Delete

fields.name: cbgWorkDays
fields.fieldText: Work Days

fields.name: displayNothingToDeleteInfo
fields.fieldText:
No Existing Work Schedules were found for {!Employee.Name}


A default schedule of Monday to Friday has been selected - you can modify this as required.

fields.name: displayHeaderScreen4
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Updated Work Schedule for

{!Employee.Name}

fields.name: displayUpdateFutureAttendanceQuestion
fields.fieldText:
You are about to update the Work Schedule for {!Employee.Name}.

By default we will then update all future planned Attendance, to reflect these changes.


You can also change the date, which these changes will take effect (e.g. if the Employee's Work Schedule will only change after a certain day)

fields.name: dateNewScheduleActiveFrom
fields.fieldText: New Schedule Active From

Success


{!Employee.Name}'s Work Schedule has been updated!

The Work Schedule has been deleted!
